sn43.11:4.1: “And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?
sn43.11:4.3: This is called the path that leads to the unconditioned.
sn43.11:4.4: So, mendicants, I’ve taught you the unconditioned and the path that leads to the unconditioned.
sn43.11:4.5: Out of compassion, I’ve done what a teacher should do for the benefit of their disciples.
sn43.11:4.6: Here are these roots of trees, and here are these empty huts.
sn43.11:4.7: Practice absorption, mendicants! Don’t be negligent! Don’t regret it later!
sn43.11:4.9: This is my instruction to you.”
